00004 #ifndef SYNAPSETEMPLATE_H
00005 #define SYNAPSETEMPLATE_H
00006 
00007 
00008 #include "ConfigBase.h"
00009 #include "Error.h"
00010 
00011 
00013 // SynapseTemplate class template definition
00014 // data (weight, delay, etc) are in SynData
00015 // the activation update mechanism is dealt with by SynMech
00016 // the plasticity update mechanism is dealt with by PlastMech
00017 // the interface is TypeBase
00019 
00020 template < class SynData
00021 , class SynMech
00022 , class PlastMech
00023 , class TypeBase >
00024 class SynapseTemplate
00025         : public SynData
00026         , public PlastMech
00027         , public TypeBase
00028 {
00029     friend class Bide<SynData>::X;
00030     friend class Bide<PlastMech>::X;
00031     friend class Bide<SynMech>::X;
00032 
00033     friend class DataCommonNeuron;
00034 public:
00035     SynapseTemplate(ConfigBase * datacfg, SynMech * const syn_mech, ConfigBase * plast_cfg, NeuronInterface * const preneuron, NeuronInterface * const postneuron);
00036     inline const double & weight() {
00037         return SynData::weight_impl();
00038     }
00039     inline const double & delay() {
00040         return SynData::delay_impl();
00041     }
00042 protected:
00043     inline void on_preneuron_fire_update(const double & time_lag_to_spike) {
00044         syn_mech_->on_preneuron_fire_update(time_lag_to_spike + SynData::delay_impl(), SynData::weight_impl());
00045     }
00046     inline void on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(const double & preneuron_spike_time) {
00047         PlastMech::on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(*this, preneuron_spike_time);
00048     }
00049     inline void on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(const double & postneuron_spike_time) {
00050         PlastMech::on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(*this, postneuron_spike_time);
00051     }
00052     inline SynMechInterface * const syn_mech() const {
00053         return syn_mech_;
00054     }
00055     SynMech * const syn_mech_;
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 
00061 // inline definition
00063 
00064 template < class SynData
00065 , class SynMech
00066 , class PlastMech
00067 , class TypeBase >
00068 SynapseTemplate<SynData, SynMech, PlastMech, TypeBase>::SynapseTemplate(
00069     ConfigBase * datacfg,
00070     SynMech * const synmech,
00071     ConfigBase * plastcfg,
00072     NeuronInterface * const preneuron,
00073     NeuronInterface * const postneuron)
00074         : TypeBase(postneuron)
00075         , SynData(datacfg)
00076         , PlastMech(plastcfg)
00077         , syn_mech_(synmech)
00078 {
00079     if (preneuron) preneuron->add_postsynapse(this);
00080     if (postneuron)
00081         postneuron->add_presynapse(this);
00082     else
00083         throw ConfigError("SynapseTemplate: null pointer to postneuron");
00084 // bide
00085 //  std::cout << preneuron->id() << "  " << postneuron->id() << std::endl;
00086 }

00089 
00090 
00091 #endif // !defined(SYNAPSETEMPLATE_H)
